hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir bin 'Abdullah that :the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) rid Mu'adh bin Jabal of his creditors, then he appointed him governor of Yemen. Mu'adh said: “The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) settled my debts with my creditors using what wealth I had, then he appointed me as governor.”

chapter.ara-name: باب تَفْلِيسِ الْمُعْدَمِ وَالْبَيْعِ عَلَيْهِ لِغُرَمَائِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Bankruptcy Of A Poor Man, And Selling His Assets To Pay Off His Creditors
